org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.physical.impl

Class TableRegion

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.physical.impl.RegionImpl
      • org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.physical.impl.TableRegion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeContainer, ContentObject, Region, RegionContainer, GeometricObject, org.primaresearch.ident.Identifiable

    public class TableRegion
extends RegionImpl
    Specialised implementation for table regions. Provides getters and setters for default attributes.
    Author:
    clc
